SELECT f.*, ifnull(g.was_num,0) wasNum,ifnull(g.was_percent,0) wasPercent,g.was_remark wasRemark FROM ( select
from ( SELECT was_type wasType, was_source wasSource FROM was_address AS a UNION ALL SELECT was_type wasType, was_source wasSource FROM was_address_list AS b UNION ALL SELECT was_type wasType, was_source wasSource FROM was_address_history AS c ) AS d where 1=1
and d.wasType = #{bean.wasType}
and d.wasSource = #{bean.wasSource}
GROUP BY d.wasType,d.wasSource) f INNER JOIN was_sys_config g ON f.wasType = g.was_type AND f.wasSource = g.was_source
and (g.was_num = #{bean.wasConfigNum} or g.was_percent = #{bean.wasConfigNum})
AND g.was_config_type = '剩余预警值'
